Operations¶

Implementations for all client/organization related heavy operations.

clients.operations.update_organization(user, org, data, files=None)¶

Method to update organization information.

Parameters:
  • user – User who has made changes.
  • org – Organization whos information is changed.
  • data – Dictionary of fields-value pair that must be updated.
  • files – (Optional) Dictionary of files to update logo/icon etc. Usually this is request.FILES.

Points:

  • Files handled: file_log, file_icon

Authors: Gagandeep Singh
